titleStmt.title: SII 7.816: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 816. (A.R. No. 189 of 1902). IN THE SAME PLACE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . tribhuvanaccakravat=tikaḷ koṉerimelkoṇṭāṉ śrīkulottuṅkacoḻadevarkku yāṇṭu 10 3vatu Irācarācavaḷanāṭṭu māttūrnāṭṭu Oḻukaṟaiyāṉa kulottuṅkacoḻanallūr piṭā
kai villiyanallūr veṟupiṟinta tiruniṟṟuccoḻanallūr Uṭaiyār tirukkāmicuramuṭaiyārkku paṇṭuṭaiyāṉum paḻaṅkāṇiyāḷarum tavirttu tirunantavaṉattukkum tirukkuḷattukkum tirumaṭaiviḷākattukkum catiram nāṉmāvaraippaṭi Iṭṭa nilam Aiy
veliyum koyilukkuc cernta nattamum nattattukkuc cernta kollaiyum nilam Aiyveliyum tirumukappaṭi nikkittu tirumukappaṭi tevatānam nikkiṉapaṭikku puravariyār Eḻuttiṭṭa Uḷvarippaṭi Irācarācavaḷanāṭṭu māttūrnāṭṭu Oḻukaṟaiyāna kulo
ttuṅkacoḻanallūr piṭākai villiyanallūr Uṭaiyār tirukkāmicuramuṭaiya nāyanārkku veṇṭu nimantaṅkaḷukku Iṟuppatāka Oḻukaṟaiyāṉa kulottuṅkacoḻanallūr veṟupiṟinta tiruniṟṟuccoḻanallūr paḻamper tavirttut tevatāna Iṟaiyi
li Iṭukiṟa nilattukku Ittevarkku tirumaṭaiviḷākamum tirukkuḷamum tirunantavanamum Ittevar koyilukkuc cernta nattamum nattattaic cernta kollainilattu paṇṭuṭaiyārum paḻamperum Iṟaikkaṭṭuk kuṭalāy varukiṟapaṭiyum tavirttut tevatāna Iṟaiyili Iṭṭu ni
ṅkalkku Uṭalāka niṟkiṟa nilattukku Ūrkkaṇakku OḻukaṟaiUṭaiyāṉ Eḻuttu kaṇakkiṉpaṭi nilamāyp pacāṉamutal tevatāṉa Iṟaiyiliyāka veṟupiṟinta tiruniṟṟuccoḻanallūr tarampeṟṟa nirnilam nāṟppattu Oṉpatiṟṟu veliyum kollainilam
nūṟṟu IrupattuOṉṟe nālumāk kāṇi Araikkāṇiyum Innilattu Ellaiyil Akappaṭṭa vati vāykkālkaḷum catiraAṟuti kaṇṇāṟukāḷālum Akappaṭṭa taramilikaḷālum nilam Irupatiṟṟu veliyum Āka nilam nūṟṟut toṇṇūṟe nālumāk kā
ṇi Araikkāṇiyiṉāl nilaOri māṭai nūṟṟu Irupate nālmāvaraiye Araikkāṇiyiṉāl māṭai muṉṉūṟṟu Orupattu Āṟaraiye muṉṟumāk kāṇi Araikkāṇiyum paḻamperum Iṟaikkaṭṭum tavirttu Iṭṭa kollainilam Aivelikku nilaOri māṭai muṉ⌈
ṟe nālumā Araikkāṇi nilaOri māṭai nūṟṟu OrupattuOṉṟu nikki nilam nūṟṟu Eṇpattu Eḻe muṉṟumāk kāṇikku nāṭuvār māṭai muṉṉūṟṟu Orupattu Iraṇṭu Araikku Aḷaviṉpaṭi 2 1000 5 100 Iṉnellu Iraṇṭāyirattu Aiññūṟṟuk kalamum yāṇṭu 10 3vatu
pacāṉamutal tevatāṉa Iṟaiyili Iṭṭamaikku Eḻutiṉāṉ tirumantiraOlai kulottuṅkacoḻa muventaveḷāṉ malaikiniyaniṉṟāṉ nāḷ 2 100 2 10 1 .
Digital edition of SII 7.816 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
